thread.title: Personal Service at COMO The Halkin
thread.title_full: Personal Service at COMO The Halkin - Review of COMO The Halkin, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: ERS2013
title: Personal Service at COMO The Halkin
text: Felt at home and cared for as soon we arrived at the hotel. We really appreciated the time and effort the wonderful General Manager took to look after us. We had a comfortable stay in a Garden Room and slept well. Breakfast room overlooks quiet garden area. Will definitely look forward to staying again.
